description: Self-improvement hooks for session introspection and learning

hooks.prompt: Before ending, run a session retrospective to capture learnings. Use the retro-analyzer agent to analyze this session and write findings to .claude/retros/ and .claude/learnings/. Create necessary directories if they don't exist. Focus on: errors encountered, patterns used, preferences observed, improvements identified, useful scripts created, and ideas for new agents or skills. Keep learnings actionable and avoid duplicating existing learnings.
